message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can we meet in the middle?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $110, so I'm offering it to you for $120. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $115. Can we meet somewhere in the middle again?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to give you a small concession, so I'm offering it to you for $118. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $118. I'm willing to pay $113 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
I understand you're still trying to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $113. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering it to you for $117. This is my final offer.
